com.week8.io

Class FileVisitorAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.week8.io.FileVisitorAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileVisitor

    public class FileVisitorAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements FileVisitor
    Adapter class for the FileVistor. Empty implementation of every method. Every method will return FileVisitResult.CONTINUE.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileVisitorAdapter()

      FileVisitResult visitFailed(java.io.File file)
      Called by the visiting FileSystem if the visitation of a directory failed, thus if the directory is not-readable.
      FileVisitResult visitFile(java.io.File file)
      Called by the visiting FileSystem to visit a file with this FileVisitor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileVisitorAdapter

        public FileVisitorAdapter()

    • Method Detail

      • postVisitDirectory

        public FileVisitResult postVisitDirectory(java.io.File dir)
        Description copied from interface: FileVisitor
        Called by the visited FileSystem after a directory has been read, i.e. after every file and sub-directory in dir has been visited by this FileVisitor. May return FileVisitResult.CONTINUE if the visiting of files and directories should continue or FileVisitResult.TERMINATE if not. FileVisitResult.SKIP_SUBTREE will have the same effect as FileVisitResult.CONTINUE.
        Specified by:
        postVisitDirectory in interface FileVisitor
        Parameters:
        dir - the directory that has been visited
        Returns:
        if the visit should continue or not.

      • preVisitDirectory

        public FileVisitResult preVisitDirectory(java.io.File dir)
        Description copied from interface: FileVisitor
        Called by the visiting FileSystem before a directory will recursively be read. May return FileVisitResult.CONTINUE if the directory should be read or FileVisitResult.SKIP_SUBTREE if the given directory should not be read but the visit of the FileSystem should continue in general. Should return FileVisitResult.TERMINATE if the visit of the FileSystem in general should end.
        Specified by:
        preVisitDirectory in interface FileVisitor
        Parameters:
        dir - the directory that may be visited
        Returns:
        if the visit should continue, skip the given directory or end at all.

      • visitFailed

        public FileVisitResult visitFailed(java.io.File file)
        Description copied from interface: FileVisitor
        Called by the visiting FileSystem if the visitation of a directory failed, thus if the directory is not-readable. May return FileVisitResult.CONTINUE if the visiting of files and directories should continue or FileVisitResult.TERMINATE if not. FileVisitResult.SKIP_SUBTREE will have the same effect as FileVisitResult.CONTINUE.
        Specified by:
        visitFailed in interface FileVisitor
        Parameters:
        file - the directory that could not be visited
        Returns:
        if the visit should continue or not.

      • visitFile

        public FileVisitResult visitFile(java.io.File file)
        Description copied from interface: FileVisitor
        Called by the visiting FileSystem to visit a file with this FileVisitor. May return FileVisitResult.CONTINUE if the visiting of files and directories should continue or FileVisitResult.TERMINATE if not. FileVisitResult.SKIP_SUBTREE will have the same effect as FileVisitResult.CONTINUE.
        Specified by:
        visitFile in interface FileVisitor
        Parameters:
        file - the file that is visited
        Returns:
        if the visit should continue or not.
